front.title: M-PIN FULL : Zero Knowledge two-Factor Authentication and Key Exchange

abstract.t: In this document, the M-PIN FULL protocol for two factor authentication and key exchange is described. This protocol mutually identifies a Client to a Server and the Server to the Client, and agrees between them a cryptographic strong encryption key for subsequent communication. M-PIN FULL requires an external Trusted Authority to issue secrets to participating Clients and Servers.
